transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, kuch network ka dikkat hai kya aapke yaha par?
Customer: Nahi sir, aapki side se problem ho rahi hai network mein thoda sa.
Executive: Network mein do baar meri aage se agar koi call aa raha hai to aapka phone cut ja raha hai sir isme. Koi dikkat to nahi hai na network ka bataiye.
Customer: Haan. Sir, mujhe sirf ek cheez aur puchni hai. Jaise abhi aapne kaha ki last three months se aap available nahi the. Aapki isliye se shayad aapki team ne handle kara hai. Basically aap hi handle karte hain profile ko right?
Customer: Ji sir. Haan haan ji sir.
Executive: Ah, sir ek chota sa mujhe feedback puchna hai. Not for this three months. Matlab ki overall feedback puchna hai. Till now aapki na maximizer ki service run kar rahi hai IndiaMART pe. To ek overall kya feedback hai sir? Ah, in terms of ROI keh sakte ho ya return keh sakte ho ya hmm hmm. Kya feedback hai on basis of service IndiaMART?
Customer: Sir service to matlab theek hai lekin isme customer ka ye hota hai na hamara matlab thoda sa client vagaira baat karte hain customer hum yaha se deal karte hain. To matlab sab kuch confirm hone ke baad mein PI vagaira send karne ke baad mein customer fir deal nahi karta.
Executive: Achcha. To abhi main hoga ki hamare rate jyada hai usko kahin se kam mil gaya ya pata nahi kya hai. To agar main aapki is year ki baat karu 2025 ki, theek hai? Ha ha. Ye completely hone wala hai to approximately kitni deal convert kar paye sir aap isme?
Customer: Ah sir isme to abhi mere ko thoda check karna padega. Matlab jyada hai nahi isme.
Executive: Conversion ratio kuch idea hai sir aapko matlab kitna kitna hua hoga isme?
Customer: Ek bar sir mere ko matlab data check karna padega purana wala apne paas mein. Kyunki aisa na jo hum mere under mein ladke kam karte hain marketing mein jo calling vagaira proper karte hain. To unhone hi calling vagaira karke deal ki hui hai IndiaMART se.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Ab wo hai aapne jab use kiya hai sir aapne jab use kiya tha matlab teen mahine pehle ki agar main baat karu. Hmm us time par to aapne use kara hi hoga matlab us estimate ke basis pe aapka kya hai matlab perception? Aisa hai na jaise jo matlab mere under mein kam karta hai na ladka wo lead matlab agar wo log kam karte hain to main usko dikhta nahi. Jab available nahi hai to isliye mujhe dekhna padega.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Haan. Theek hai. Dusra sir ek cheez mujhe aur confirm karaiye. Main aapki profile matlab mere samne khuli hai iske andar. Hmm hmm. Aapki profile pe na do product aise hain jo inactive dikha rahe hain. Ah jispe dekh pa raha hu photos bhi nahi hai even. Ah cosmetic glass karke ek product hai aur dusra hai bottles karke category aapki. Ah sir ye dono check karna padega. Deal karte hain ye confirm karna chah raha hu aap isme.
Customer: Deal to hum sare product mein karte hain apne.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir? Ah deal to hum sare product mein karte hain.
Executive: Ah in dono mein bhi karte hain sir matlab jo abhi maine naam liye hain isme? Haan in dono mein bhi karte hain. Ek bar dekhna padega ki matlab pura complete usme hai kya.
Customer: Abhi panel aapke samne khula hai IndiaMART ka sir currently? Abhi nahi sir actually thoda main bahar tha plant mein abhi mere ko aadhe ghante lagega system mein pahunchne mein computer mein.
Executive: Ah sir in case agar hume koi video meeting aapke sath karni hai to aapka comfortable time kya rahega sir in case? Aap mere ko sir lunch ke baad kar sakte ho 3 baje ke baad mein.
Customer: Lunch ke baad mein right sir? Haan haan ji sir. Available rehte hain sir 3 baje ke baad mein. Haan haan 3 baje ke baad aap kar lena sir.
Executive: Bas ek final cheez sir aur bata dijiye ah iske andar. Ji ji. Ah pehle to sir ye hai ki ye jo yaha par Nitin Aggarwal sir hain matlab. Haan haan. I think he is a main owner? Haan ye owner hai sir.
Customer: Ye main owner hai sir. Agar sir agar hume unse agar meeting karni hai in case including matlab aapko include karke to kya process hai company ka aapka matlab? Sir actually mujhe unse time lena padega pehle uske liye. Fir main unse time leke aapko bata paunga kis time pe available rahenge wo. Matlab meeting karte hain na sir ye main puchna chah raha hu matlab video meeting. Haan meeting meeting karte hain unse time lena padega uske liye.
Executive: Achcha time lena padega. Main isliye bolna chah raha hu sir main aapko reason bata deta hu. Actually agar main aapki profile review kar raha hu abhi waise to aap leave pe the to aapko itna idea nahi rahega aaj hi shayad aapne join kara hai ispe. Haan haan. Aapki profile pe na maximizer ka plan chal raha hai currently. Ji ji. Theek hai sir. Aur agar main dekhu iske andar to iska matlab renewal bhi generate kuch din hi hone wala hai kuch month ke baad mein. Theek hai?
Executive: To abhi current ki agar main baat karu to mujhe jo milna hai sir ke sath mein ye services ke sath mein sir jo basic discussion hai hamara services parameter. Iske upar plus mujhe proposal bhi discuss karna hai matlab maximizer ke aur current pe jo chal raha hai ya iske upar ka jo plan hai. Upgrade ke regarding to wo discussion kya aap karenge sir? Pehle aapse karna padega ya wo sir hi karenge. Matlab sir ko hi explain karna padega ya hierarchy kya hai matlab aapke through jayegi ya kaise jayegi sir isme? Actually unke paas time nahi hua to aap se baat kar sakte hain. Inka approval le lunga.
Customer: Wahi main kehna chah raha hu pehle main aapse discuss karu plan iske andar? Aap mujhse discuss kar lo aap aap mujhe plan bataiyega fir main unke sath mein discuss karke unse approval le lunga aage sir.
Executive: Achcha fir ja ke aap discuss karenge right iske andar. Sir ek bar apni mail id confirm kara denge ek bar please? Account dot.
Customer: Account dot. F sorry. @yahoo.com.
Executive: Account dot sir account dot ke aage kya hai? FAGW.
Customer: F A A GW ji @yahoo.com yahoo.com. Theek hai sir main isme koshish karunga ek bar aapse reconnect karne ke regarding main ya meri team after lunch aur ek bar video meeting kar lete hain profile samajh lete hain uske baad mein ek bar plan ke bare mein discuss karte hain sir ek bar. Theek hai theek hai sir. Theek hai baki sir ye feedback aaya hai isko main yaha se close kar raha hu theek hai? Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says deals not converting after PI sent.

- Wants to know the process to meet Nitin Aggarwal.

- Wants to know who will discuss the plan.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for feedback on IndiaMART services.

- Executive asked about deal conversion rate.

- Executive asked about inactive products on profile.

- Executive scheduled a video meeting after lunch.

- Executive will try to reconnect after lunch.

- Executive took customer's email ID.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will reconnect after lunch.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, maximizer, video meeting, profile, inactive products
